strings.jsxtext: The local directory containing your projects, custom addins, and prototypes, as well as your user settings for General Interface Builder.
The base URI to the General Interface directory on a local HTTP server hosting this General Interface installation.
Optionally, if the relative path to your workspace is not the same on the HTTP server as on disk, specify its path here.
